titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a popish libell intituled A petition to the bishops, preachers, and gospellers, lately spread abroad in the north partes. By Francis Bunny Prebendary of Durham; sometimes fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Francis, 1543-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: With the text of the petition.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
